EmailTemplate.subject: Fancy Going Behind the Scenes @ Starbucks with The Challenge?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Would you like the opportunity to go behind the scenes with Starbucks and get some great experience to put on your CV?
Come along with The Challenge to Sutton Coldfield's Starbucks store at 6pm on Thursday 28th April. You will work together in a team to create your own Starbucks drink and pitch it to a panel of Starbucks Dragons!
You will also:
Find out what a global company looks for when recruiting young people Find out about what goes on behind the scenes at a real live Starbucks Find out how to give yourself a HeadStart with your future next summer
Tickets are limited and deadline to sign up is Friday 22nd April.
